languages.text: "Не тебе, Амик'Соломон, рассуждать о боли. Своей ты позволил поглотить себя и стать гневом. Моя же боль всегда — точило для духа".

traits.locale_text: "Не тебе, Амик'Соломон, рассуждать о боли. Своей ты позволил поглотить себя и стать гневом. Моя же боль всегда — точило для духа".

languages.text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."
languages.original_text: "Не тебе, Амик'Соломон, рассуждать о боли. Своей ты позволил поглотить себя и стать гневом. Моя же боль всегда — точило для духа".

traits.locale_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."
"It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

"It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

languages.text: 「痛みについて語る資格はあなたにはない、ソロモーン。あなたは自らの苦悩に飲まれて、それを怒りへと変えた。私の痛みはいつだって、魂を研ぎ澄ます砥石なんだ」
languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「痛みについて語る資格はあなたにはない、ソロモーン。あなたは自らの苦悩に飲まれて、それを怒りへと変えた。私の痛みはいつだって、魂を研ぎ澄ます砥石なんだ」

languages.text: "Es steht Euch nicht zu, von Schmerz zu sprechen, Amic'Solomorne. Ihr habt zugelassen, dass Eure eigene Pein Euch auffrisst und zu Zorn wird. Mein Schmerz ist, wie immer, ein Schleifstein für den Geist."
languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Es steht Euch nicht zu, von Schmerz zu sprechen, Amic'Solomorne. Ihr habt zugelassen, dass Eure eigene Pein Euch auffrisst und zu Zorn wird. Mein Schmerz ist, wie immer, ein Schleifstein für den Geist."

languages.text: « Vous êtes mal placé pour parler de la douleur, Amic'Solomorne. Vous avez laissé votre propre souffrance vous consumer et se changer en colère. Ma douleur est et restera une pierre à aiguiser l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes mal placé pour parler de la douleur, Amic'Solomorne. Vous avez laissé votre propre souffrance vous consumer et se changer en colère. Ma douleur est et restera une pierre à aiguiser l'esprit. »

languages.text: «No le corresponde a usted hablar de dolor, Amic'Solomorne. Se ha dejado consumir por la angustia hasta que solo le ha quedado la ira. Mi dolor es, como siempre ha sido, un acicate para el espíritu».
languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

traits.locale_text: «No le corresponde a usted hablar de dolor, Amic'Solomorne. Se ha dejado consumir por la angustia hasta que solo le ha quedado la ira. Mi dolor es, como siempre ha sido, un acicate para el espíritu».

languages.text: “你无权谈论痛苦，信者索罗蒙。你默许自己被痛苦吞噬，将它变成了怒火，但我的痛苦却如同磨刀石一样砥砺着我的精神，一如既往。”
languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

traits.locale_text: “你无权谈论痛苦，信者索罗蒙。你默许自己被痛苦吞噬，将它变成了怒火，但我的痛苦却如同磨刀石一样砥砺着我的精神，一如既往。”

languages.text: "Senin acıdan bahsetmeye hakkın yok Amik'Solomorne. Acının seni tüketmesine, içinde öfkeye dönüşmesine göz yumdun. Benim acımsa ruhumu keskinleştiriyor."
languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Senin acıdan bahsetmeye hakkın yok Amik Solomorne. Acının seni tüketmesine, içinde öfkeye dönüşmesine göz yumdun. Benim acımsa ruhumu keskinleştiriyor."

languages.original_text: "It is not your place to speak of pain, Amic'Solomorne. You allowed your own anguish to consume you and turn to anger. My pain is, as ever, a whetstone for the spirit."
